word:
Sanitarium, Cal., May 14, 1906. 

To the Medical Superintendent 
            of the Melrose Sanitarium. 
     Dear Brother: I was very much pleased to receive a letter from you regarding the sanitarium at Melrose. I have not been situated so that I could respond sooner. Early in April we were called upon to attend the dedicatory exercises of two of our Southern California sanitariums,--at Loma Linda, near Redlands, and at Paradise Valley, near San Diego. . . .
